body: So you added the second page to explain why she was so carefree. Liked it better when I thought she was nuts.

The script is too straight forward and simplistic. Try again

I’m the one who copied the text in Photoshop. So editing page by page, I didn’t notice the high frequency of f-bombs. I was so distracted trying to evolve all my trade only Pokemon that I didn’t even title the previous gallery correctly.
What I learned from this is that some online translator try to give correlation to every character, in this case being sex. This is most likely caused by the lack of periods in Japanese. I may have been able to avoid those mistake if I include all the ! and ? in the translator.
Thus phrases like “Oh well” were translated as “F*** it”, “Great” was also changed to “F***” but only in some places and now others. But you must remember the Engrish memes are also made possible thanks to online translators so results my vary. In the end it’s still mainly my fault since I wanted to play Pokémon while translating, but I can now laugh at how crazy the first one turned out.
after reading this retranslation without so many fucking fucks kinda strange xd

This is a more accurate translation. The old one was purely feed in an online translator all at once. That caused some unique words being chosen. That fact that I was trading online in BDSP while in Photoshop editing didn’t help my concentration. This time I personally translated this line by line. I also changed the text to make it a better read.
Straight Forward with incest is meh
